page.title: 16Recreation in Grundisburgh
page.content:
List of Clubs and Organisations which provide recreative activities and their approximate memberships: Mothers Union, 21; Womens Fellowship, 13; Mothers and Toddlers, 19; Youth Club, 61; Cubs, 11; Scouts, 13; Brownies, 21; Girl Guides, 17; Boys Football Club, 10; Bowls Club, 21; Tennis Club, 37; Darts Club, 21; Cricket Club, 9; Keep Fit, 12; Womens Institute, 42; National Housewives Reg. 18; Golden Club, (O.A.P.), 24; Local History Society, 45; Horticultural Soc. 45; Amateur Dramatic Society, 32.
Many clubs and societies provide an educational element. Further recreative facilities are to be found in the nearby towns of Woodbridge and Ipswich, 5 and 10 kms.
